title: Yanbou Ninbou Tonbou no Koutsuu Anzen
original_name: ヤンボウ・ニンボウ・トンボ ウの交通安全
sinopse: An education film for children starring the Yanbou Ninbou Tonbou it teaches traffic safety. Though the setting may be hard to relate unless in a rural area, as the cast tries to cross an old wooden suspension bridge that falls apart and they must make their way to safety.
